copyright.title: Copyright and Trademark Rights
copyright.content: All content displayed on this website, such as texts, photographs, graphics, trademarks and trade names are protected by the respective protective rights (copyrights, trademark rights). The use, reproduction, etc. are subject to our rights or the rights of the respective authors or rights holders.

violations.title: Notice of Legal Violations
violations.content: Should you notice any legal violations within our website, please notify us. We will remove illegal content and links immediately upon becoming aware of them.
